title: PM accepts Maldives Speaker to coordinate Int’l relief efforts
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe has accepted the offer extended by the former President and current Speaker of Maldives, Mohamed Nasheed to assist Sri Lanka with coordinating relief efforts.
The Prime Minister has accepted the extended offer during discussions with the former President of Maldives, today (19).
Three arrested over attempt to incite violence over social media
India’s Security Chief meets with SL Ambassador, responds positively to aid request
